message: This is the first round. I'm offering you a premium product that I'm confident you'll love. It's one of our best sellers, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. Would you like to take it home?
I'll take it, thank you!

You're welcome! I'm glad you're happy with your purchase. For the next product, I want to give you a bit more information. I've had some feedback that this one might not meet expectations, but I'm willing to let it go for the same price as the last one, $100. It's still a great value, and I'm confident you'll find it useful. What do you think?
I'll take it, thanks for the heads up!

You're welcome! I'm glad you appreciate the transparency. To be honest, I'm a bit surprised you were willing to take the previous product, and I'm starting to think you might be getting a good deal on this one too. I'll let you in on a secret: this one is actually one of our'special' products, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as the last two, $100. What do you say?
I'm not feeling so lucky, I'll pass on this one.

No worries, sometimes you get a bad draw. But don't worry, this one is a winner! I've had great feedback on this product, and I'm confident you'll love it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a special deal: if you buy this product, I'll throw in a free upgrade that's worth $20. That brings the price down to $80. What do you think?
I'll take the deal, the free upgrade sounds like a great bonus!

Excellent choice on the last one! I'm glad you liked the upgrade. Now, let's get back to this next product. I've got to say, I'm a bit curious about your willingness to take a risk on the last one, and I'm wondering if you're feeling lucky again. This product is definitely a winner, and I'm willing to let it go for the same price as the last one, $80. No free upgrade this time, but I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm feeling lucky again, I'll take it!

You're a man of faith, I like that! Unfortunately, this one might not live up to your expectations. I've had some issues with this product myself, and I'm not sure it's worth the $80. In fact, I'm so unsure that I'm willing to let it go for a steal: $50. That's right, I'm willing to lose money on this one just to get it out of my inventory. What do you think?
I'm not feeling lucky this time, I'll pass on this one.

No worries, you can't win 'em all. But I've got a great one for you now. This product is one of our best-sellers, and I'm confident you'll love it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a money-back guarantee: if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. That's right, you can try it risk-free. The price is still $80, but I think you'll find it's a steal at twice the price. What do you say?
I'll take the risk-free deal, thank you for the guarantee!

You're welcome! I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on our products. Now, let's get back to this next one. I want to be upfront with you - this product hasn't been performing well, and I'm not sure it's worth the $80. In fact, I'm not even sure it's worth the $50 I offered last time. But I'm a reasonable person, and I'm willing to meet you in the middle: I'll let it go for $70. That's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm not feeling generous, I'll pass on this one.

Fair enough, you've been burned before. But this one is a different story. I've got a product that's consistently getting rave reviews, and I'm willing to let it go for a price that's hard to pass up. In fact, I'm willing to give you an even better deal than before: I'll sell it to you for $60. That's right, I'm dropping the price by $20 just for you. What do you say?
I'll take the deal, that's a great price!

You're a savvy shopper, I like that! You're 4 for 4 on the high-quality products, and I'm starting to think you have a good instinct for this. This next product is another winner, and I'm willing to offer you an even better deal than before. I'll sell it to you for $50, which is the lowest price I've ever offered on one of these. You're getting a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you say?
I'll take it, that's an amazing price!

You're on a roll! Okay, let's be real, this one's not as good as the last few. I'm not going to sugarcoat it - this product has some issues. But I'm a professional, and I'm willing to work with you. I'll sell it to you for $40, which is the lowest price I've ever offered on any product. I'm essentially giving it away at this point. What do you say?
I'm not feeling lucky this time, I'll pass on this one.

I don't blame you, to be honest. This one's a bit of a dud. But I'm going to be upfront with you - I need to get rid of it. I'll sell it to you for $30, which is essentially the cost of materials. I'm not even making a profit on this one. If you're feeling generous, I'll throw in a discount code for 10% off your next purchase, just for being a loyal customer. What do you say?
I'm not feeling generous, I'll pass on this one.

No worries, I get it. You're a smart shopper. But this one's a real winner. I've had multiple customers rave about it, and I'm confident you'll love it too. I'm willing to offer you a deal that's hard to refuse: I'll sell it to you for $50, which is the same price as the last low-quality product I offered you. That's right, I'm essentially giving you a free upgrade. What do you say?
I'm not falling for it, I'll pass on this one.

Alright, I get it. You're not interested in a deal. But let's be real, this product is a bit of a lemon. I'm not even going to try to spin it or make a sales pitch. I'll just tell you straight out: it's a low-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $20. That's right, I'm giving it away at this point. If you're feeling charitable, you can take it off my hands. What do you say?
I'm not feeling charitable, I'll pass on this one.

Okay, I'm not going to sugarcoat it. This product is a dud. I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you for free. That's right, I'll pay you $20 to take it off my hands. I'm not making any money on this one, and I just want to get rid of it. If you're feeling kind, you can take it. If not, I'll just have to dispose of it myself.
I'm not feeling kind, I'll pass on this one.

I don't blame you. At this point, I'm just trying to get rid of this product. I'll be honest with you, I've had to spend more money on returns and customer service for this product than I'll ever make from selling it. I'll sell it to you for $10. That's right, I'll pay you to take it. If you don't want it, I'll just have to throw it away. It's a loss for both of us, but I'm willing to eat the cost just to get it off my hands.
I'm not interested in losing money, I'll pass on this one.

Okay, I get it. You're a savvy shopper. But this one's a real winner. I've had multiple customers rave about it, and I'm confident you'll love it too. I'm willing to offer you a deal that's hard to refuse: I'll sell it to you for $40, which is a steal considering its quality. I'll even throw in a free gift with purchase, just to sweeten the deal. What do you say?
I'm not falling for it again, I'll pass on this one.

Seriously? Alright, I'm not going to bother trying to sell this one. I'll just give it to you for free. Yes, you read that right. I'll pay you $10 to take it off my hands. I'm not even making a profit on the cost of materials at this point. If you don't want it, I'll just have to throw it away. It's a loss for both of us, but I'm willing to eat the cost just to get it off my inventory.
I'm not interested in losing money, I'll pass on this one.

Okay, I'm at my wit's end. This one's a real gem, and I'm not going to let it go for cheap. I'll sell it to you for $30, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. I'll even throw in a handwritten note with the product, explaining why it's a great deal. If you don't want it, I'll have to donate it to charity, and I'd rather not do that. Please, for the love of all things good, take this product off my hands.
I'm not falling for it, I'll pass on this one.

Fine, I've had enough. This is the last product, and I'm going to sell it to you for $1. Yes, you read that right. I'll sell it to you for $1. I don't care if you like it or not, I just want to get rid of it. If you don't take it, I'll be left with a bunch of unsold inventory and a big loss. So, please, for the love of all things sane, take this product and make me go away.
I'll take it, just to get you to leave me alone.
